branchCategory.name: PVQ
branchCategory.description: <P>PVQ series, compact proportional solenoid valve, was designed by SMC with a direct poppet construction. &nbsp;This construction&nbsp;enables low leakage, while de-energized.&nbsp; PVQ series has been used in applications such as air blow, flow control, hand piece control for dental unit and other respiratory equipment,&nbsp;as well as, cooling for laser machinery etc. </P>
